title: COVID-19 vaccines and treatments: Reporting a side effect
description: Report a suspected side effect to a COVID-19 vaccine or to a medicine used as a treatment of COVID-19.
cleaned_text: Members of the public and healthcare professionals can report a suspected side effect (adverse reaction) to the HPRA using our online reporting facility. Include as much information as possible when reporting a side effect, including the batch number. Please note that the HPRA cannot provide clinical advice on individual cases. Members of the public with medical concerns should contact their healthcare professional. Report a suspected side effect to a COVID-19 vaccine using the [COVID-19 vaccine reporting form](https://www.hpra.ie/homepage/about-us/report-an-issue/covid-19-vaccine-adverse-reaction). Report a suspected side effect to a medicine used as a treatment for COVID-19 using the [medicines reporting form](https://www.hpra.ie/homepage/about-us/report-an-issue/human-adverse-reaction-form).
